scripts.copy: rsync -aq src/content.js dist/src/ && rsync -aq src/imagenet_classes.js dist/src/ && rsync -aq manifest.json dist/ && rsync -aq src/icons/* dist/src/icons/
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/background.js --dist-dir dist/src/ && npm run copy
scripts.watch: npm run copy && parcel watch src/background.js --hmr-hostname localhost --dist-dir dist/src/ -o background
